BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20115271 HKM (N 110093 HKM), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.433, LP-2368) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Loew’s Canal Street Theatre Building, located at 31 Canal Street  (Block 297, part of Lot 1) as a historic landmark, Council District no. 1.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Loew’s Canal Street Theatre Building, located at 31 Canal St. (20115271 HKM (N 110093 HKM)

Items.Title: Application no. 20115271 HKM (N 110093 HKM), pursuant to §3020 of the Charter of the City of New York, concerning the designation (List No.433, LP-2368) by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Loew’s Canal Street Theatre Building, located at 31 Canal Street  (Block 297, part of Lot 1) as a historic landmark, Council District no. 1.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
